content: Not only has VCU won six straight and re-enteredthe USA Today Coaches’ Top 25 poll at No. 21  but the Rams haven’t trailed at all intheir last five games. Their latest win was an Atlantic 10 Conference-opening75-58 victory Sunday at Fordham  in which the Rams had 21 steals and forced aseason-high 28 turnovers.
